title: Video: How To Dress Well – & It Was U
body: With the release of **[How to Dress Well’s](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/17953-review-how-to-dress-well-total-loss/ "Review: How To Dress Well – Total Loss")** Sophomore LP, _[Total Loss](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/17867-stream-how-to-dress-well-total-loss/ "Stream: How To Dress Well – Total Loss")_, now a distant memory, it’s heartening to see him still present with this rather difficult new video for _& It Was U_. It’s remarkably unexpected, featuring a bleached colour pallet of yellows and greys, it aggressively yet poetically addresses the ideas of worship and cult like devotion in a surrealist montage that remains bathetic, while still being scarily close to the bone. Somewhere, somehow, this is going down.
